notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Okuqukethwe kwakho kuzocashwa ngokungaziwa emva kwezinsuku eziyi-7
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Yonke imininingwane yakho kulo mphakathi izocashwa ngokungaziwa futhi igcinwe emlandweni emva kwezinsuku eziyi-7, ngemva kwalokho ngeke ukwazi ukuyisusa noma ukuyiguqula. Bona okuqukethwe kwakho ngezansi.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Yonke imininingwane yakho kuleli qembu izocashwa ngokungaziwa futhi igcinwe emlandweni emva kwezinsuku eziyi-7, ngemva kwalokho ngeke ukwazi ukuyisusa noma ukuyiguqula. Bona okuqukethwe kwakho ngezansi.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Chofoza isixhumanisi somphakathi esingezansi, ngena njengomphathi bese ukhetha Ukuphathwa kobugebengu kumenyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Inani lemisebenzi engase ibe yinkohliso enethuba elinganiselwa ku-75% lokuba yinkohliso
email.possibleFraudInformation: Uhlelo lwethu oluzenzakalelayo luthole umsebenzi ongase ube yinkohliso. Ungabheka ngokucophelela nge-interface yomphathi womphakathi. Eminye yale misebenzi ingase ibe nezizathu ezingeyona inkohliso ngakho qaphela ukuphenya ngokucophelela ngaphambi kokususa okuqukethwe.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Lokuqukethwe kubekwe uphawu ngokuzenzakalelayo njengokunobuthi kusetshenziswa ama-algorithms e-AI akala ubuthi bokuqukethwe. Ungasusa okuqukethwe uma kudingeka.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: I-algorithm ye-AI ngokuzenzakalelayo ibeke uphawu lwezithombe ezihambisana nalokuqukethwe. Leli algorithm lihlola izithombe zokungenzeka kwabantu abadala, udlame, ezokwelapha, nezithombe ezinobungozi. Ungasusa okuqukethwe uma kudingeka.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Ngezinye izikhathi i-algorithm ye-AI ibala amaphuzu angalunganga, kulokhu ungakhathazeki, awudingi ukuthatha elinye igxathu futhi ungaziba le imeyili.
email.user_invite_2: Cofa kusixhumanisi noma unamathisele kubha yekheli lesiphequluli ukwamukela isimemo
email.reset_password_2: Uba awukaceli lokhu, sicela uzibe le imeyili.
email.reset_password_3: Iphasiwedi yakho angeke ishintshe ngaphandle kokuthi ungene kusixhumanisi esingenhla udale entsha.
